body_content.explanation: used to describe a person whose gender was said at birth to be female but who identifies more with being male than female:
examples: The charity provides free chest binders to transmasculine people.
Oliver is a transmasculine nonbinary person.

body_content.explanation: relating to people whose gender was said at birth to be female but who identify more with being male than female:
examples: I attended an online transmasculine support group.
He wants to see more nuanced media representations of transmasculine identities and experiences.
